T02D3387:55a-1: badzra sram kha l'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3387:55a-3: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3387:55b-0: rdo rje lcags @55b sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3387:55b-1: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas rang gi snying gar
T02D3387:55b-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um ljang gu'i yi ge
T02D3387:55b-3: las nges par rdzogs pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma
T02D3387:55b-5: sngon po dang dkar po ni g-yas dang /
T02D3387:55b-7: zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum mo //
T02D3387:55b-8: rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02D3387:55b-9: mda' ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
T02D3387:55b-12: gzhu ni g-yon gyi phyag gsum na'o /
T02D3387:55b-13: mdog ljang ser zhal cung zhig bzhad pa /
T02D3387:55b-14: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3387:55b-15: gdug pa can gyi sems can 'dul ba'i bdag nyid dbu bsams la /
T02D3387:55b-16: phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3387:55b-17: de la lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcings nas //
T02D3387:55b-18: mthe'u chung dang sdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam
T02D3387:55b-19: pa can du bcing bar bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D3387:55b-22: aom badzra sri kham le h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bya'o //
T02D3387:55b-23: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3387:55b-24: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
